name: Sÿdes
description:
As member of an extinct race, the whispers of the universe has brought you to this strange planet, that takes form according to your conscience , now your past its about to be revealed.

This is Sÿdes: A puzzle-platformer help Zero on finding the route to escape this strange planet, with his power of manipulating gravity of certain objects.

You can manipulate gravity in the N,S,E,W directions, be careful the magnetic poles in this planet are flipped.

Controls and Abilities:

WASD ---> Movement and Jump                                                   Arrows---> Gravity control

Stick on: Just in the gravity squares, get to close to them and hold the WASD in the direction you want to be stick it.

*Note: If you get stuck on any level, please restart it *
